thread.title: BRIEF-Asure Software Reports Q4 Adj Earnings Per Share $0.04

title: BRIEF-Asure Software Reports Q4 Adj Earnings Per Share $0.04
text: March 15, 2018 / 12:56 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Asure Software Reports Q4 Adj Earnings Per Share $0.04 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 15 (Reuters) - Asure Software Inc: * ASURE SOFTWARE REPORTS RECORD FOURTH QUARTER REVENUE AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS; RAISES GUIDANCE FOR 2018 * Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.04 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 REVENUE $15.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $16.1 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.20 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $79 MILLION TO $82 MILLION * FOR FISCAL 2018, EXPECTS NON-GAAP EBITDA, EXCLUDING ONE-TIME ITEMS, OF BETWEEN $18.0 MILLION AND $20.0 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
